Square, Inc. - Software Engineering in Atlanta, GA

We started with a simple idea—that everyone should be able to accept credit cards—and we've been rethinking buying and selling ever since. Buying and selling sound like simple things—and they should be. Somewhere along the way, they got complicated. We’re working hard and building a team to make commerce easy for everyone.

We’re looking for talented and passionate engineers to come join us in ATL. We work on a variety of problems and products at Square, with a strong focus on solving shared engineering problems and improving all of our products. We strongly value correctness, scalability, and availability.

You have:

Strong coding skills and Computer Science fundamentals Analytical problem solving skills Pride in shipping

Technologies we use and teach:

Java, Jetty, protobufs, JSON Ruby, JRuby, Rails MySQL, Hibernate, JOOQ Redis, HBase, Hadoop, and Kafka JavaScript, jQuery, Ember.js, Sass, and CoffeeScript

Projects we work on:

Platform Infrastructure: The foundation that enables building highly scalable and available products. Commerce: The core platform for our products. Register: our point of sale. Everything a seller needs to start, run, and grow their business. Payments: building a beautiful, friction-free checkout experience.
